oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Smoky Mt. Transit Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Smoky Mountain Transit Co. advertisement from the Knoxville Journal supplement, January 1936.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tour guides; Tourism; Buses; Great Smoky Mountains; Advertisements;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See the Smokies As They Should Be Seen FROM OUR COMFORTABLE, ESPECIALLY BUILT. OPEN TOP SIGHT SEEING BUS Making daily trips, leaving Union Bus Terminal 9 A. M. We also pick up guests at all Knoxville hotels. These modern buses equipped with every safety device; manned by experienced drivers and lecturer who knows every point of interest in the Great Smokies, stopping at strategic points of interest. Smoky Mountain Transit Co. We Also Operate Regular Bus Service. SEVIERVILLE and GATLINBURG For Information Call UNION BUS TERMINAL Phones —2-5141—3-1923 H. L. HOFFMEISTER. President
